  The provisions of this article shall, notwithstanding the provisions of
article 2, apply to taxes of every kind and description.
[97] It is significant to highlight the six basic principles contained in Article

24  of  the  OECD  Model  on  non-discrimination  which  are  more  or 
less

identical  to  the  provisions  on  non-discrimination  set  out 
in  the  DTAA
between India and Sri Lanka. Those six basic principles in Article 24 of the
OECD Model on non-discrimination are as follows:
